scripts.//: TODO: File under development build. Unused in production, for now.
scripts.data2json: echo 'MYAPP.busStops =' > js/bus-stops.js && js-yaml data/bus-stops.yaml >> js/bus-stops.js && echo ';' >> js/bus-stops.js
scripts.//: Converts data/bus-routes.yaml into separate bus routes in js/bus-routes .
scripts.deploy-bootstrap: cp bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css css && cp bootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js js
scripts.publish: git branch -f gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && npm run data2json && npm run deploy-bootstrap && cp js/config.js.sample js/config.js && cp .gitignore.publish .gitignore && git add js/bus-routes js/config.js js/bootstrap.min.js css/bootstrap.min.css && git add .gitignore && git commit -m "Publish" && git push -f origin gh-pages
